check.description: check if the email is in users table in bidata DB

delete.description: create sql to "delete" in users table

check.description: check if the user id is in sessions table in sessions DB
check if the email is in friend_email table in bidata DB
check if the friend email id is in friend_address table in bidata DB
check if the user id is in minted_account table in bidata DB
check if the user id is in minted_order table in bidata DB and  order has been placed and NOT completed

check.description: check if the user id is in minted_order table in bidata DB and  order has been placed, completed, and not passed the return policy,  3 months after purchase
check if the minted_order_line_item is digital

choices.notes: TODO: We need to wait for the return policy to pass before we delete data

userId.description: user id from the main drupal database

snippets.find_user_id: select uid into @UID from users where mail = @email;
snippets.update_placeholder_in_users:
update users
set
name = @textplaceholder,
init = @textplaceholder,
mail = @emailplaceholder,
pass = textplaceholder,
where uid = @UID;
snippets.find_friend_email_id: select id into @friendemailid from friend_email where email = @email;
snippets.find_friend_address_id:
select friend_address_id into @friend_address_id
from friend_email where id = @friendemailid;
snippets.find_minted_order_incomplete:
select *
from minted_order
where owner_id = @UID
and is_placed = 1
and minted_state_diagram_state_id <> 150;
snippets.find_minted_order_complete:
select *
from minted_order
where owner_id = @UID
and is_placed = 1
and minted_state_diagram_state_id = 150
and date_add(order_placement_date, interval 3 month) >= now();
snippets.find_minted_order_digital:
select moli.*
from minted_order mo
inner join minted_order_line_item moli
on mo.id = moli.minted_order_id
and moli.line_item_type = 'product'
where owner_id = @UID
and is_placed = 1
and minted_state_diagram_state_id = 150
and date_add(order_placement_date, interval 3 month) >= now();
